localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

previous.excerpt:
This community has been helpful for providing analysis, advice, and a TON of
helpful resources, that being said however I've noticed some toxicity in the
sub-reddit as well. Everyone seems to think that they are all gurus in trading,
and they have the "right" answer. But, the reality is that there…
previous.title: Somewhat of a throw-away post, but just a PSA, please remember that not everyone trades the same way.

localize.title: 有点抛砖引玉的意思，但只是一个公益广告，请记住，不是每个人的交易方式都一样。
